body_html: Can cwrap be modified to not transform if_true/if_false, the few places where it is used modified to quote the strings, and then use if_true: false, if_false: true instead of negate? This would be easier to support in the ATen wrapper rather than another flag that modifies arguments.
body_text: Can cwrap be modified to not transform if_true/if_false, the few places where it is used modified to quote the strings, and then use if_true: false, if_false: true instead of negate?  This would be easier to support in the ATen wrapper rather than another flag that modifies arguments.
body: Can cwrap be modified to not transform if_true/if_false, the few places where it is used modified to quote the strings, and then use if_true: false, if_false: true instead of negate?  This would be easier to support in the ATen wrapper rather than another flag that modifies arguments.
